    Implements a TableDataSource based on a Java Bean class.
    class 
    CsvTableDataSource
    Implements a TableDataSource based on CSV-Data in: An InputStream An remote URL A local File A String To define CSV properties like record delimiters or whether the data has a header row, the class uses the Apache Commons CSV CSVFormat class.
    class

    Implements a TableDataSource based on a Jackson ArrayNode holding JSON-encoded table.
